mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NUM, B.MEMBER_ID, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENTS, B.HITS, B.BOARD_ORIGINALFILE, B.BOARD_SAVEDFILE, B.BOARD_SUGGESTION, B.REGISTRATION_DATE, B.BOARD_NOTICE AS, B.CATEGORY, M.MEMBER_ROLE FROM WEB_BOARD B, USER_MEMBER M WHERE B.BOARD_NOTICE = 0 AND B.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC
SELECT * FROM WEB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NOTICE = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_NUM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE WEB_BOARD SET HITS = HITS + 1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_SUGGESTION FROM WEB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
